dcterms:creator: Joonseok Lee
Walter Reade
Rahul Sukthankar
George Toderici
dcterms:description: The YouTube-8M Segment Dataset is an extension of the previous YouTube-8M Dataset which includes human-verified segment-level labels. It contains multiple 5-second segments sampled based on classifier scores, with a total of 237K segments covering 1000 categories labeled by human raters.
dcterms:title: YouTube-8M Segment Dataset

dcterms:creator: Sami Abu-El-Haija
Nisarg Kothari
Joonseok Lee
Paul Natsev
George Toderici
Balakrishnan Varadarajan
Sudheendra Vijayanarasimhan
dcterms:description: The YouTube-8M Dataset contains 6 million high-quality video samples from YouTube, split into training, validation, and test sets. It includes video-level annotations with 3862 class labels and an average of 3 labels per video.
dcterms:title: YouTube-8M Dataset
